client.control

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      • client.control.ClientController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientController
extends AbstractClient
    ClientController inherits from AbstractClient and creates the connection to server.

    shays

    • Field Detail

      • controller

        public IController controller
        Store an instance of a class that implements IController interface. Usually used to save last used controller to handle server replies.

      • userInterface

        public java.util.ArrayList<IUi> userInterface
        ArrayList of IUi implements a stack of GUI windows. Helps to manage the displayed windows and switch between screens.

      • userPrivilege

        public java.lang.String userPrivilege
        Stores the connected user's privilege level.

      • userName

        public java.lang.String userName
        Stores the users's username.
